item.title: Hail Command
item.dc:creator: @icepkers icepkers
item.description:
@icepkers wrote:

public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “All join ManikScape best server out there!!!”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}

Read full topic

item.title: Hail Command
item.dc:creator: @Cyanidesuicide Cyanidesuicide
item.description:
@Cyanidesuicide wrote:

I know people have added this command before and I’ve looked through them before posting this. All I want is a simple Hail command where they bow down and say “ALL HAIL “+playerName+”!”. If anyone can make one that works for Crazyfazes 317 source I will be thanksful. Here is a code that i tried before and gave me errors that I will post under code.

[code]public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.playerText = “ALL HAIL “+playerName+”!”;
castOn.playerTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}

if(command.startsWith(“hail”) && playerRights > 2){
hail();
}[/code]

Read full topic
